args_list.sequences: List[int] or List[List[int]] or ndarray or Tensor

params.name: sequences
params.description: List of tokenized input ids. Can be obtained using the __call__ method.
params.default: List[int] or List[List[int]] or ndarray or Tensor

params.name: skip_special_tokens
params.description: Whether or not to remove special tokens in the decoding.

params.name: clean_up_tokenization_spaces
params.description: Whether or not to clean up the tokenization spaces.

params.name: kwargs
params.description: Will be passed to the underlying model specific decode method.
